body.description: Product Description Old Spice Men's Antiperspirant and Deodorant reduces underarm sweating and odor. To use, turn the base to raise the anti-perspirant and wipe armpits for lasting sweat reduction. What's better than smelling like man? I'm so glad you asked, because the only thing better than smelling like a man is smelling like a man who knows how to smell manly. I'm talking about the sophisticated scent of a man who uses Old Spice. Fresh is the ever-impressive scent of clean citrus. Old Spice Men's Invisible Solid Antiperspirant and Deodorant reduces armpit sweat, goes on invisible, and stays feeling dry. So get yourself some High Endurance collection and prepare for success, because it will find you no matter what. From the Manufacturer This is an Old Spice Anti-Perspirant & Deodorant you will find in the medicine cabinets of haunted houses. That’s because it’s spooky how good it works. It goes on clear, and lasts all day. Don’t be frightened by its manly, yet invisible power. Odor protection lasts all day, even into your graveyard shift at the plant. Old Spice High Endurace Anti-Perspirant & Deodorant.At a GlanceHidden underarm powerIt goes on clearHigh-performing odor protectionFor a True Olfactory Experience, Try Them TogetherYou can't get enough of this scent. But you can try.Long-Lasting Stick Anti-Perspirant & DeodorantLong-lasting. Stick.Body WashDrop-kicks dirt and odorClear GelLong lasting but clearLong-Lasting Stick DeodorantA scent with staying powerFrequently Asked QuestionsManly Scents to Choose FromWhat are the pros of procuring this product?It plants a flag of fragrance high atop your man mountainIt gives heart to the weak, while striking fear into your enemiesIt smells like cobra fangsIt allows you to mark large geographical areas with your scent and increase your dominionIt increases your ability to sense other dimensionsIt makes you feel like a delicious meatball sandwich for womenIt makes larger mammals fear youIt allows you to save small animals using only your man scentWhat are the cons of procuring this product?It incites an unmistakable urge to wrestle large animalsIt creates a desire to climb tall mountains simply because they existIt smells too manlyIts manly scent causes people to assume you’re an astronaut able to answer aerospace queriesWhat if my current soap isn’t manly enough?Try Old Spice Body Wash.What if I smell like a turtle cage?Try Old Spice Deodorant.What if I want to slap the smell of America on my face?Try an Old Spice fragrance in Aftershave or Cologne.What if my armpits spring a leak?Try Old Spice Anti-Perspirant.What if I’ve lost my man-smell?Try Old Spice Body Spray.Pure SportFreshPlaymakerOriginalGame DaySmooth Blast

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Old Spice Men's High Endurance Deodorant - Nearly Perfect but With Room for Improvement
reviews.reviewText: Old Spice Men's High Endurance Deodorant is a product that has become a staple in my daily grooming regimen. Upon purchasing the pack of six, I found myself immersed in a world of invigorating scents and long-lasting freshness. The brand has been a household name for decades, and with this particular product, they've managed to elevate the standard deodorant game to a level that rivals even some of the more luxurious brands in the market.While my experience has been largely positive, I aim to provide a balanced review that not only lauds its strong points but also highlights areas where improvement could turn this already excellent product into the perfect one.🌬 The Fragrance Factor: A Symphony of Scents: When it comes to deodorants, scent plays a crucial role. Old Spice's High Endurance collection offers a delightful variety of fragrances that cater to different preferences. Whether you lean towards woodsy, citrusy, or more subdued notes, there's something in this pack for everyone. Each application feels like a refreshing splash that is both invigorating and comforting.💪 The Power of Longevity: Say Goodbye to Reapplications: One of the standout features of this deodorant is its lasting power. A single application in the morning has proven sufficient to last me through a long day at work, followed by a rigorous gym session. That's an accomplishment that only a handful of deodorants have been able to achieve in my experience.🌿 Skin-Friendly Formula: Kind to the Skin but Tough on Odor: Another commendable aspect is the formulation. Even with daily use, I haven't experienced any skin irritation or excessive dryness. The product appears to be free from harsh chemicals, which is reassuring for those with sensitive skin.🎯 Precision Application: No Streaks, No Drama: The deodorant stick is designed in a way that makes application easy and fuss-free. It glides on smoothly, leaving no residue or visible streaks on clothing. This is a highly underrated feature, as the last thing anyone wants is to ruin their outfit with unsightly deodorant marks.🌍 Eco-Friendly Packaging: A Step Towards Sustainability: It's heartening to see that Old Spice is making strides towards sustainability by opting for packaging materials that are more eco-friendly than most competitors. This adds an extra layer of satisfaction to the purchase.However, as with any product, there are always areas that could be better:🔄 Consistency is Key: Room for Improvement: While the pack offers multiple scents, I found that not all were created equal in terms of longevity. Some fragrances lasted throughout the day, while others seemed to fade more quickly. Consistency across the range would elevate this product to the next level.🔬 Ingredient Transparency: What's Really In It?: Although the product claims to be skin-friendly and hasn't caused me any issues, a more transparent list of ingredients would be beneficial for users who are more cautious about what they're applying to their skin.🏷 Pricing Conundrum: Is Bulk Buying Always Better?: The pack of six offers value, but it could be intimidating for someone who wants to try the product before committing to such a large purchase. An option for smaller packs or individual units sold at a reasonable price could attract more potential users.Taking everything into consideration, Old Spice Men's High Endurance Deodorant earns a strong 4-star rating. The fragrance variety, longevity, skin-friendly formula, precise application, and steps towards eco-friendly packaging are major pluses that outweigh the minor negatives of fragrance inconsistency, lack of ingredient transparency, and pricing concerns.If you're on the fence about which deodorant to choose for daily use or even for specific activities like workouts, this product is definitely worth a try. Its combination of performance, quality, and value is hard to beat.Thank you for taking the time to read this detailed review. I hope it assists you in making an informed decision and brings you a step closer to finding your ideal grooming product. With Old Spice Men's High Endurance Deodorant, you're not just investing in a deodorant; you're investing in a lifestyle upgrade. Happy grooming!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 12, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is good stuff and comes in the larger US pack. Never understand why UK deodorant comes in such small containers which makes it more expensive and is bad for the planet and adds plastic into the system. Excellent service as well.
Toller Preis, Richtiges Produkt, Zollamt reibungslos.
